title.postBlueText: all secure lifetime cloud storage plans!

PaymentSection.description: This Singles Day, start a secure relationship with online privacy. Internxt’s encrypted cloud is committed to securing your files and keeping your data private from cyberattacks and data collection.

faq.question: How can I get the Singles Day Discount?
answer: To claim your Singles discount, choose a 2TB, 5TB, or 10TB plan and head to the checkout page.
Your 80% discount is automatically applied at the checkout.

faq.question: When does the Singles Day promotion end?
answer: The Singles Day offer ends November 30, 2024.

faq.question: Who is eligible for this discount?
answer: New users or anyone with a fee Internxt account can take advantage of our Singles day discount.

faq.question: What is Internxt’s refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee across all its paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
And if you're ever unsatisfied with our service, reach out to us at hello@internxt.com and request a refund. We will honor your request, no questions asked!

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can add as much storage as you want to your Internxt lifetime membership. Internxt lifetime plans are stackable. Simply purchase them with the same email address and contact us at hello@internxt.com so we can stack them together for you on the same account.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: Currently, we accept payments via credit and debit cards (including Mastercard, VISA, American Express, and more), and we also accept Paypal, bankcontact, iDEAL, and SOFORT.

faq.question: Have more questions?
answer: Feel free to contact us at hello@internxt.com or visit our help center.

title.normal: What our users are saying about internxt

cards.name: Eva Williams
cards.review: Internxt es un servicio de almacenamiento en la nube conveniente para clientes conscientes de la privacidad. Tiene una interfaz simplificada y un equipo de soporte confiable, lo que lo convierte en una excelente opción para aquellos que necesitan almacenar sus archivos de manera segura.

cards.name: Cristian M.
cards.review: La mejor alternativa cifrada a Dropbox. En general: Necesitábamos una alternativa que nos permitiera almacenar archivos de clientes y trabajo (archivos de redes sociales) y como Internxt es compatible con GDPR, encajó perfectamente para nosotros.

cards.name: Josep Carrizo
cards.review: He estado usando Google Drive durante varios años, pero necesitaba una alternativa que me garantizara la privacidad de mis datos. Algo que Google u otras plataformas conocidas no pueden hacer. Por eso me mudé a Internxt.

CtaSection1.title: Show your data some love this Singles Day!

CtaSection2.title: Fall in love with online privacy

FeatureSection.title: Grab your Singles’ Day offer that lasts a lifetime!
FeatureSection.description: We build all our products with privacy in mind. We don’t run our business on data or advertising; we build it on trust. Our encrypted technology protects your files and ensures you keep your fundamental right to privacy.

PlatformSection.title: Access your files anywhere, anytime
PlatformSection.subtitle: Internxt is available on all platforms, meaning your files are just a click away!

cards.title: Unhackable and unleakable data
cards.description: We don’t store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.

cards.title: Uncompromising security
cards.description: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge AES-256 encryption, you are the absolutely only one with access to your data.

cards.title: Open source and transparent
cards.description: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

cards.title: Independently verified
cards.description: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

HeroSection.description: Treat yourself to a lifetime of secure, encrypted cloud storage, now at 83% OFF!
